channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere Virtual Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere Virtual Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2020-4575|2024-09-16T19:35:46.352Z -- ibm -- websphere%20virtual%20enterprise
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server ND 8.5 and 9.0, and IBM WebSphere Virtual Enterprise 7.0 and 8.0 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting when High Availability Deployment Manager is configured.
